content.detailedDescription: 1. looking to the east out my bedroom window, from bed.           2. it's size (just smaller than a dime), it's constant illumination (about that of the moon, and it's slow movement.                                                               3. at 1st i thought it was a helicopter.                         4. the object apperade to be just smaller than a dime. illuminated about the same as the moon. it moved very slow maybe 5 mph. from north to south. (i have no way to judge actual distance, speed or size)                                        5. the 1st time i saw it i thought it was a helecopter, but it's light was to big and never changed in its luminescences. i watched it for awial (maybe 5 min.) till it got to bout the east south-east portion of the sky. the 2nd time about a month later i saw the same object on the same flight path. this time i woke my little brother and mother to witness and confirm what i was seeing. both where seeing what i was, neither knew what it was. (in all honesty i dont thik they where more than mildy amussed. they showed no real intrest.)i did at this time go outside to try and hear something, but to no avail. (really didnt think i would hear anything because i judged the object to be to far away. but i did try anyway) i had almost predictable sightings of the same object from about 1979 to 1981. maybe a dozen sightings in all.                                                                6. always lost sight of the object in the same portion of sky. east south-east. just disapeared.                                  personal history. i have spent alot of time on air force bases, and am very familiar with all types of aircraft. i have never been able explain what i saw.
content.summary: white illuminated disk or circle about the size of a dime. moved very slow. never changed colors.

content.detailedDescription:
The pictures of the ufo were taken with a picture phone.
was on an airplane flying from tulsa, okla to florida. we left tulsa mid morning. the plane had just leved out. was taking pictures of the clouds below when i saw a light moving from the back of the plane to the front. this happened several times, there were 4 pics taken, 3 of the pics show lights 1 shows a ship like object convex shaped. the objects just took of from the away from the plane. it was moving faster then the plane.The people on the plane setting next to me looked at the pics and we were all kinda weirded out by the whole thing. there was anouther picture taken on my way to show a friend the pictures i had taken on the plane, the sun was sitting and i was taking pic of the sunset when i looked at the pic later, there was an object simular to what i had taken on the plane. we are in the process of getting a cord to download the pictures from the picture phone to the computer.
content.summary: Was on an airplane and was taking pic of the clouds saw a few lights 1 of the pics showed an objects looking like a ufo

content.detailedDescription: Was camping above fall creek res. watching night sky.Saw glowing object coming from west to east thought it was plane landing light.It went pass at approx. 30 to 40 mph but there was no plane or noise. it kept going east until it was out of sight over the mts.
content.summary: Glowing ball aprox. 15 ft. in dia.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to the foggy bottom metro station in downtown washington dc (george washington university campus area).  it was very crowded and slow moving toward the station's escalators, as this was after the "2000" celebration on the national mall.  one friend was with me, but did not see the ufos.  at first i was not really watching the sky, but saw out of the corner of my eye what i "thought" was a shooting star (but it would have to have been a really big shooting star!).  i even said something to my friend, who wasn't really paying attention.  so now i was watching the skies while very slowly moving from the street to the top of the escalators.  that's when i started to see these very strange looking objects fly over downtown.  i estimate i saw a total of about 8 objects; i saw 2 groups of 2 objects each flying very close together, but the others were "by themselves", although all 8 or so objects were flying in a straight line, one after another.  several seconds would elapse between one object and another (or pair of objects).  i assume they were cylindrical shaped based on the peculiar lighting i saw.  they all appeared the same.  after "seeing" the "shooting star" (which most likely was one of these objects), the first i truly saw must have been two of these objects very close to each other (which looked even stranger); after seeing a few not flying so close, i determined that they were all this cylindrical shape, rather than 2 shapes.  they flew from a wnw direction to a ese direction, almost directly above where i was at the time (slightly south of my position), and i estimate that their trajectory, if unchanged, would have had them pass over the white house and the us capitol.  no turns, no curves, no change in altitude...Just a straight flyover, horizon to horizon.  i had much more of a western horizon than an eastern horizon, as there was some park-like space beyond the escalators to the west, but 12-story buildings elsewhere, including to my east; therefore i saw them approach more than i saw them depart.  i noticed no typical aircraft noise at all; however, it was a very noisy crowd i was in at the time...But the altitude of these seemed low enough that if they were conventional aircraft, some noise should have been noticed in spite of the crowd.

i was quite stunned throughout the event.  it is the most unusual thing(s) i have ever seen in the sky (unless i saw some in my early childhood, which is possible).  i only said, and not loudly, at one point during the flyover, "am i seeing ufos?"  my friend was not paying attention at all, but a bystander, a young man, just glanced at me and smiled politely.  i did not notice anyone else observing these, but i wasn't really paying attention to the people around me at this time...In fact, i found myself suddenly at the top of the escalator.  i wish i would have turned around and stayed longer to see if i could see more of these, but i was surrounded (the crowd was like sardines) and the only way seemed to be "down" at that point, so i and my friend entered the station like everyone else.  

it occurred to me that i had seen something very unusual and significant.  i had a "semi-belief" in extraterrestrial life and ufos prior to this, but this was just entertaining speculation.  this event changed all of that.  now i was "one of them"....One of "those people" who have seen such things.  so, in a way, it seemed like an "initiation".  certainly a "paradigm shift", and made a believer out of me for certain.  i told my friend after we got seated on a metro train about what i saw, asked her if she saw them.  she said she did not, and she gave me a "funny" smiling look, like she was trying not to laugh.

i will attach a powerpoint presentation that made, which i presented last december at the colorado mufon meeting and holiday potluck.  john schuessler of int'l mufon was present as well.  i will also attach a shorter one about a sighting i heard about around 1997, from a friend who worked at the cia (langley).
content.summary: Amber-lit apparent cylindrical objects, approx 8, flying in straight line on same trajectory

content.detailedDescription:
i "myself" along side of my own family 
members has had strange encounters 
and strange happenings take place in 
our house (every house we moved too 
they followed)..Ok my first encounter 
that i remember is when i was a young 
girl of the age 11-12 yrs old,(im 28 now)
anyways i was in my bedroom in my bed
in  a drifty sleep stage 
and fell asleep,i was awoken by tapping 
on the outside of my bedroom window, 
i looked out and seen this glowish grey 
like misty figure it called to me to follow 
it, when i stepped up from off my bed i 
was already transported to the out side 
somehow. anyways it motioned for me 
to follow and directly called me to hurry, 
i went to take a step towards it , it 
zoomed darted off and transported me 
to a empty field, where there was a group 
of these grey like figures small like the 
size of a 1 yr old child but there was one 
that was a bit taller then the others, they 
told me things and showed me this huge 
hovering trianglar symbol with a revolving 
square( cube ) everything was transparent 
and glowing) and inside the square was a 
circler ball pulseing , it was very odd 
cause the whole thing was moving in a 
odd like rhythem, the ball was rotating inside  
the square, and the square was rotating 
inside the triangle , i can also remember  
i wanted to touch it but the grey figures 
said in a loud voice not to touch it or 
"we" all would die, it is not the time but 
you are choosen to ( but i cant remember) 
what else .. ... after that i seen them appear 
from time to time as if they are checking 
in on me, and letting me know that they 
are there..Is there anyone here that had 
a experince like this ..Following the hovering 
triangle with a square in it and a circle ball 
in the square ( or anything to do with these
 3 shapes???) i would really like to know..If 
anyone  is out there like me..? i would really
like to hear if anyone has any idea what 
this object could be...... someone mentioned
that it could be some kind of reactor.....??  

i am sending in a sketch of the object along with a few notes about it.
content.summary: Its all written on my attached picture&notes

content.detailedDescription: I woke up at 3:11 am on 5/17/06 to a very bright light in the sky.  i watched it for a while thinking that it was a star but then it started moving in a jaged motion horizontally then vertically.  i woke my husband up to take a look as it kind of freaked me out.  we went out on the deck to watch it.  at first he thought it was a star or planet but the other stars were not moving.  it really was quite an amazing sight.  we sat there for about 10 minutes just watching it trying to make some explanation of it.  we went back to bed and i continued to watch it until falling asleep.
content.summary: Very bright light in the west that moved horizontally then vertically

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on my parents front lawn with my brother, my wife had a baby shower going on inside and we didn't want to take part, i saw somthing out of the corner of my eye, i instantly said to my brother, "look! a shooting star!"  but then i realized it wasn't, a star, but something flying close enough to the ground to reflect the city lights from it's belly. it was low enough that i would have expected to hear engine noise, but there was nothing. it was flying about as fast as a jet going over a stadium before a big game.  it was wedge shaped, very pointy nose. my brother didn't see it, as it was very faint in the dark sky. he kept trying to see it but it had dissappeared very quickly, just going in a southern direction. i thought it was a jet, but then there was no sound before and after, i was amaized and curious and no one but my brother belived me, my wife still laughs when i tell the story.  about a 9-10 months later, i saw the same thing, while i was driving home late one night after work, but was about 13 miles north of where i saw the first sighting. my parents house is right next to interstate 15, and i was driving on i-15 when i saw the 2nd sighting. the craft did the same exact thing the 2nd time, heading in the same direction.
content.summary: Triangle/wedge shape, reflected city lights from bottom of craft, no sound, fast low flying

content.detailedDescription: Walking outside to empty trash and my niece whom is five was asking me "what is that" all excited well i ignored her thinking she was trying to scare me. when she got her sister to look whom is ten then i noticed they were both over excited about these lights i then went out to look. i saw these lights up in sky appeared to be close by just sitting there in a line.Not blinking or moving. then one by one they shut off just like that with nothing there behind them but the stars.We video taped a short bit of it but not the whole time it was there cause we werent sure what it was. we then called local news to see if anyone had reported seeing these lights and they said no and that was it. we were just curios on what it could of been.There were no planes or helicopter flying around the sky was very clear and stars were very visible all over. it did freak the family out for a while but it just left us all in wonder. one boy did report seeing the same thing to my nephew who video taped it, and he got all shakin up about seeing these lights and couldn't tell anyone.
content.summary: A line of five light orange colored lights in a straight line sitting in one place. looking like stadium lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dog out for a walk at the end of the block of where i live. i noticed because i always like to look at constellations as i walk the dog. i thought the object was a jet at first glance. i then noticed that it was an orangish red color not plane light color. the object also flickered intermittently like it was a star but was much too bright to be a star. the object moved at the same speed the entire time. it came in from my view out of the east heading west, then slowly turned to the north for about 10 seconds, finally slowly turned to head south. i watched it until it disappeared. however, the object wasn't so far away that it disappeared it poof disappeared. the entire experience lasted only 5 min. my reaction was a little scared and excited at the same time. i also said to myself they are back. this is the 4th sighting i have had of these same lights since july of last year. my wife has had 2 of these sightings. one of which the object was close enough to the ground to make her think it was a kite.
content.summary: Orangish red light popped in from the star lit sky slowly moving west. then turned north for about 10 seconds, finally turned south for about 2 min where it just poof was gone.

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on 52nd street past the synagogue that is about 15 blocks north of dodge. car in front of me stopped and driver looked out the window at it. the triangle was hovering and then flew off. higher than the treetops, but much lower than an airplane. no noise.
content.summary: Flying triangle with lights around its perimeter over north 52nd street about 15 blocks north of dodge

content.detailedDescription: I was on a flight from cincinnati to houston last night, i was listening to some music and i was looking out the window on occasion to watch the sun set. i looked this particular time and i was noticing a cloud formation and i looked to the right and i saw another plane going by the opposite direction and i noticed the contrail. i looked back at the clouds and i noticed a cigar shaped object and as i looked another plane with a contrail was heading in the direction the the right of the objecta dn i thought that it was rather large in comparison to the plane. i continued to watch the object as we were passing south and it became a dot that i watched until it was out of sight.
content.summary: Very large cigar shape, slow moving

content.detailedDescription: I was laying down on a trampoline looking at the big dipper and just star gazing with my girlfriend.  then i noticed a bright flash of light under the big dipper.  as soon as the flash happened i saw a bright circular light that shot north east from where it first appeared in a slightly upward angle.  it stopped suddenly, blinked and then disappeared.  it was a bright bluish white color that moved much faster than any of the planes seen around here from the local airport.  the lights were also about 20 times brighter than those seen on an airplane.  i didnt know what it was because i knew instinctively that it wasnt an airplane.  i had already seen two that night.  completely different.
content.summary: Appeared out of nowhere shot a short distance under the big dipper stopped, flashed a few times and then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Three of us were driving home at dusk after dinner, and a passenger in the car exclaimed, "what is that in the sky?" i slowed the car down and we each saw a large, black rectangle with 3 lights on the top over santa fe.  it didn't appear to be a vehicle, but looked more like a "square hole" because the interior of the square looked more like a "portal" rather than a vehicle.  strange.  this is the first time i've ever experienced anything like this.  we each went home and drew what we saw and our drawings were quite alike.  in a matter of seconds, the object simply disappeared from sight and we were left wondering about our sanity.
content.summary: Black, hollow rectangle with lights

content.detailedDescription:
At home in bed felt restless got up looked out window.
could not belive what i saw called my wife to come have a look. slow moveing acrossed sky lost sight ran to kitchen window did not see anymore.Fist time i have seen anything 
it so many felt a bit uneasy.
content.summary: 7to8 circle shaped  and orange in colar.Flying over power lines.At differnt heights.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out on my good friends back porch in north minneapolis having a quick smoke.  i was sitting back looking at birds fly overhead.  it was an overcast day, so the birds were just black silouettes against the clouds.  i saw the object as soon as it came into view, moving north to south, or from right to left as i was positioned on the porch.  i thought it was another bird as it just appeared black and seemed to be approximately the same size as the birds flying high overhead.  after a couple seconds of watching, i noticed it had a perfectly circular shape, was moving in a straight line, and seemed to be much higher in the air than i had previously thought.  it was moving very quickly just below the cloud banks, and i could see this because wisps of could would appear in front of the object as it passed.  i became confused as my mind could not place this object into a definable category, and i stood up to watch its continued flight.  i watched it for about another 50 seconds before it passed out of sight beyond some trees to the south.  it did not noticably deviate from its course the entire time i viewed it.  one last strange thing, near the end of my sighting, the previously flat, disc shaped object seemed to stretch out along a vertical axis, as if it had turned on its side and was rolling like a wheel.  i could not determine if the object had actually changed shape or if it had merely turned on its side.  i went inside to tell some friends what i had seen after it passed out of sight.  i was laughed at and was told what i saw was a frisbee or something.  however, there is nothing i know of that could have thrown or fired a disc at that speed for that length of time over that great a distance.  i am still baffled by what i saw.
content.summary: Fast, black disc speeding over north minneapolis

content.detailedDescription: I noticed an unusual looking small round cloud in the eastern sky at sun rise (about 6;00am), so i took 4 photos of it from the same vantage point all within a matter of about 16 seconds. (i normally take 4 photos of everything i shoot to insure that i get atleast on good shot) the thought of this being a ufo never entered my mind until i downloaded the photos into my computer and saw that the cloud made some atypical and huge moves within a matter of seconds.  also on the photos is a small saturn like bright object that i didn't notice when i was taking the photos, this object did not move.  included in the photos is the horizon line, trees, a jet trail, and the sun.  i believe the time line of these photos can be accuratly determined by measuring the movement of the earth -vs- the sun.  there are no military bases in the area of the objects, there is a microwave tower in that area, but not near the objects.  i showed the photos to a local tv weatherman in attempt to determine if this was a natural occurance, the weatherman looked it over and showed some of his educated friends all of whom cannot provide and explaination.  since i didn't believe that i was taking photos of a possible ufo, i didn't download them into my computer right away, nor did i pay attention to the sighting after the point that i took the photos so i do not know how long this episode lasted.  i am sending you two close up side by side photos, of each object, and one full view photo that has been color corrected.  i am kind of protective of the originals.
content.summary: 4 photos of round cloud that made huge moves in a matter of seconds, also a saturn

content.detailedDescription: This incident happened to my husband who is strict sceptic and non-believer of anything he cannot touch. he went to turn on a pool pump shortly after 6am.  he noticed a very bright star northeast of our back porch.  he thought it was very unusual that the star would be this bright so early in the morning.  this observation with him thinking the latter took maybe 5 seconds. then he went to the pool pump.  it takes him about 20 seconds to get to the pool and turn the switch on. when he stood up he had a full view of the star again (it was still there, stationary).  he was looking at it for about 10 seconds.  then the star "jumped up", and disappeared to the left (north) within 3 seconds.  he stood at our yard for a couple of seconds longer, since he thought it was only a dream.  he looked to the southers sky, and then back again, and the star was not there.  when he came indoors he told me, trying to make a joke of it, that he saw "your ufo", since he knows about my knowledge and interest in this subject.  we both forgot about the incident, until today.  we were just chating, and discussing certain subjects i study at a present time, and came about his observation that happened one and a half year ago.  this time he encouraged me to report it.
content.summary: Very bright star stationary for 25 sec went into quick motion and disappeared in 3 sec

content.detailedDescription: I was driving eastbound on hwy 417,in ottawa canada. as i came around the turn right before st-laurent exit, i saw ahead in the mist there was a light in behind this cloudy foggy mist, right above the highway! as i almost didnt believe my own eyes! in the time it took to focus my eyes for a clearer look the light s had intensified and in the time it took to open the flip on my mobile phone it had vanished at mach speeds i then exited the queensway at st lawrent and tried to confirm the i was not crazy but no one had seen it but one woman did recall seeing a flash. the craft looked medievel like, and appeared to be made up of smaller cigar or cylindrical craft maybe 20 of them but who knows for sure? at firt i thought they were lights from the  jetform ballpark but as i came through the apex of the turn i then realized this was much larger
content.shape: Boomerang,  Cigar,  Chevron,  Cylinder,  Triangle,  Other
content.summary: The craft looked like a light rack for a huge concert or a stadium light rack!

content.detailedDescription:
This has to do more with  what walked through my house more then a sighting of an object outside.

that night was just after my 16th birthday.  infrequently there would be brilliant lights outside of my window.  we owned a lot of land behind us and there were no cars back there, it wasn't hunting season and it wasn't our family.  there was never and explanation for the lights.
anyway this night was different.  i seemed to wake up with a noise.  i sat up and to my absolute shock here comes this form, tall, not short, walking through my wall from my brothers room.  it was human form underneath with a glowing exterior.  this thing walked across my room and stood in an opposite corner from me turning to look at me.  
as it turned to look at me i felt myself falling backward and falling to sleep.  
i didn't tell anyone for a week.  things like this just didn't happen!  i think i must have been in shock.

a week later i told my mother.  she said she saw the same thing and told our pastor.  it was said to have been our guardian angel.

my daughter has been seriesly bother by ufo, esp. during here child birth years.  my daughter and i are watching closely our grandaughter.
content.summary: This was a flash of light in my room through my window which occurred many times.   there was 10 miles of woods and swamp behind our house and no reason for flashing brilliant lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I was backing to make an early trip.  looking up from my back yard as the lights on this object didn't match the surrounding stars.  i saw what appeared to be a shadowy triangle shape, very large, gigantic.  because it sort of blended in with the background i simple discounted the situation as imagination.  
as i was packing up my car i would continue to look up.  the object was moving, taking a northeast direction and doing so very slowly.  i could see this happening because the triangle would slowly cover and uncover stars behind it.
the lights didn't completely remain white, they would flicker a rainbow of colors.
i had to leave and there were no neighbors to wake at 3am in the morning.  however i did wake my husband.  
i was in a hurry to leave for my trip.....I should have taken photos....That's the only real proof isn't it.
content.summary: Huge, i can't compare it anything i've ever seen.  triangle, with lights on it outsides and moving very slowly.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i where taking a drive through the woods in umore park in rosemount minnesota. we saw a very bright star like oject in the sky that was starting to move. as it moved we noticed a second light become visible, slmost like the headlights on a car. the object was about 100 feet above the woods and about 5 blocks away. as it started to turn we noticed that it was larger than the lights, it had a large black body that concealed it against the night sky and had red lights on the top and bottom and  an orange light on the back.   we kind of stared in awe at first and it started towards us.   suddenly we heard very loud noises all around us sort of like gunfire, rapid gunfire. although that is impossible as we where about 5 miles into the woods.  i noted the time as 11:30 pm.  i kind of lost it and started driving fast out of the woods, but as i was deep in it took a while, about 5 minutes down the road i heard the noises again, as we had not left the woods yet. after that the object disapeared into the sky.  i was very shaken up as i have always been scared of ufo's since i saw one as a child.
content.summary: Large round black object with red lights.

content.detailedDescription:
i was outside walking to the shed which is just behind my house at 11:30 pm one summer evening in 1982 when i happened to look up towards the full moon.  i was stunned to see a large glowing lime green oval moving slowly,  silently, across the sky.  it was already halfway across the sky when i first saw it. the object appeared to be moving at a constant speed angling in a downward direction.  the entire object glowed the same color and its edges were indistinct with a green glow.  it gave off no other light than this.  there was no "tail".  it appeared to be close, no more than 200-300 hundreds yard away and maybe 500 feet in the air.  i stood and watched it move across the open sky and behind a few pine branches.  i watched the object for about 15 seconds before it went out of sight behind a pecan tree, still on a downward direction never having varied its speed.  the object stayed the same color and size for the entire sighting.  when i lost view of it behind the tree i thought it might be headed down into the pasture behind the shed.  i wanted to go see, but first i ran back into the house and grabbed my m1 carbine and put in the 30 round clip.  i shook my sleeping wife and excitedly told her what i had seen and that i was going out to see where it was. of course, she didn't even wake up.  so  i went out the back door and headed out towards the pasture.  i saw nothing, found nothing.  after awhile i calmed down although i stayed outside for about an hour looking up into the sky.  i don't really know what i would have done had this object been hanging around in the pasture.  might not have had the guts to fire on it.  and i remain struck by the fact that had i not been outside and looking up in those few seconds, this thing would passed silently by.  

     now the object was so large and bright and easy to see that i have always been able to remember just what it looked like and how it moved.   so that anyone can see what i saw that night i have drawn the object onto a digital photograph that i recently took of the sky, complete with the full moon and some pine trees just about like they were the night of the sighting.   this photo is a pretty good representation of what i saw in the sky that night.   the red dashes indicate the object's direction. the color and luminosity of the object is fairly accurate.
content.summary: A  glowing, indistinct lime green oval as big as the moon silently moved across the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in my mom's vehicle to school about a minute after we dropped him off i noticed a bright metalic object in the sky. my mom said it was a plane......She works on planes for a living ,but i didn't see the wings on the plane.......So i watched it and i noticed another one....Then after a while i noticed aproximately five of these ufo's. they were all bullet shaped exactly identical. which to see two identical planes in one area as that is very slim. they all apeared to be scouting one very large area , and they apeared to be moving in a circular area.
content.summary: Aproximately 5 bullet shaped objects.......Over school area....Seemed as if they were scouting the area.

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in my mom's vehicle to school about a minute after we dropped him off i noticed a bright metalic object in the sky. my mom said it was a plane......She works on planes for a living ,but i didn't see the wings on the plane.......So i watched it and i noticed another one....Then after a while i noticed aproximately five of these ufo's. they were all bullet shaped exactly identical. which to see two identical planes in one area as that is very slim. they all apeared to be scouting one very large area , and they apeared to be moving in a circular area.
content.summary: Aproximately 5 bullet shaped objects.......Over school area....Seemed as if they were scouting the area.

content.detailedDescription:
driving home from a movie sw of belleplaine with my girlfriend, now my wife. talking about where her friends and realitives and frinds lived, as i didn't know anyone around there
     the strange thing was that it seemed to contact us as we had to be ahead of it over a 1/3 of a mile and it was close to 2,000 ft. up. i wasn't driving very fast on a rock road. i suddenly slowed down, rolled the window down and had to look back and high in the sky. why did this happen as we were engrossed in our own conversations. i feel as if got my attention without realizing it. it gave off a very intesive band of light, the color of a highite marker in a narrow band. i stopped, watched and listened. it was a clear fall starlite nite, it caught up to us and that was when i knew that it was not a plane or helicopter as it made no soud or had any blinking lights around it.
     suddenly without warning in the snap of a finger it was alongside us verticaly down to just above tree height as it could not have fallen that fast by gravity but seemed to be powered down. we watched it pass over the dry tree leaves by a mere 3 or 4 ft. never seemed to disturb them at all.
      we were in a vally with hills in the back ground so i tried to obseve everything i could about this craft as it was so close to us. that's when i told my wife, she was only 16 at the time, this is a chance of a lifetime a real ufo.
      it was only about 60yds. out from us hanging motionles   and about tree top high. it just hung there like it was observeing us just like i was it. 
       my wife started screeming and digging her nails into me as she was petrified and missed out on most of the excitement, buiring her head under my arm. the best was yet to come. there did seemed to be alot of electricity in the air as her hair was standing out all over and when i looked down on my arms my hair was standing straight up to as aroud my head.
       i was not scared of it maybe because i was so busy studing it. it hung there for quite a few minutes it seemed to be about 40 ft. in dia. what was differet was that the intensive light i talked about was only comming from inside the craft. because it was your typical saucer shape and at night i took everything into consideration. it had be they called portholes or windows, they were triangler in shape but with the top squared off. the bright light emitting from these lit up the silver sloped deck and that is what i had always seen. the underneath of course was dark but planly seen even at night. there was a roundish canopy on top.
     what totally sshocked me was that something partially blocking one porthole moved from where it had been and it or something else blocked most of another one. i kid you not was i actually seeing a ufonaught while watching and thinking was sonething watching me.
     yes, it finally started moving very slowly toward the end of the field as we sat there astounded. at the end of the field and across the road on a hilltop was a farm place in order to clear the farm stead the ufo and because it was a lot lower had to clear it rose straight up maybe 50 ft. and just cleared the top of the house and slowly drifted away out of sight. those people in that house had no idea how close they were passed over.
      the craft only seemed to move at right angles such as straight up or down to correct for elevation but whatwe seen was never any movement at angles . i forgot to say that it seemed to be about 12ft. from bottom to top.
       we went on our way home that night, never said a word about to anyone even to our folks as who would believe us. we never said a word to each other all the way home as to the exception , " why us " !!!!!
       i have my own written account or book i have kept all these years for us. we have never told or given this information out publicly like this and as i get older it's time to do so. i have some footage of programs i have taped over the years and lookig back i foud what i think is as close to the one we seen.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Driving along, object  high alongside back of car, i  stoped  ufo droped alongside, over field  60yds. away just  hovered  there, so got a good look at  it   .

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my apartment for lunch.  my wife and i heard the sound of really loud jet engines, so we went outside to see two f16's flying at extremely low altitude.  i turned around to look the way that they had come, and noticed a glint in the sky.  a moment later it moved so that i could see it clearly.  it was a dull gray color, and triangular in shape. it straightened so that it was perpendicular with the ground, and i had trouble seeing it. it was about a thousand feet above the lake in the bullfrog marina at lake powell.  the object seemed to phase in and out of visibility, appearing suddenly several thousand feet away from where it disappeared. it made no noise that we could tell.  after about three minutes of watching the object, it just disappeared.  as a side note, i was wearing sunglasses at the time that i spotted it.  i have noticed that when i wear sunglasses, they filter out some light waves, making it easier to see rainbows in the clouds and stuff like that.  if i had not been wearing my sunglasses, i do not think that i would have seen the object.

many of my neighbors saw the f16's, but my wife and i were the only people that saw the triangular object.
i went to my truck and grabbed my binoculars and camera, but the object did not re-appear.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I noticed a triangular shaped ufo appeared above lake powell shortly after 2 f16's flew past at low altitude

content.detailedDescription: A star-like light traveled across southeastern utah in the canyon lands national park. it traveled from (possibly) the northwest toward southeast. it started at the horizon just after dusk. it travleled at an immpossible speed making no noise what so ever. as it went to the southeastern horizon it vanished. it look like it left our atmosphere. approx... 90 seconds later we heard a loud boom, we all looked up at the sky and located a jet was flying in the same flight path. 4 people saw it and 1 missed it. 2 witnessed it disappear at the camp sight, and 1 camper saw it from a walk she was on. the story was also confirmed by 3 others in the same natioal park the next morning. this took place at 9:14-9:19 on may the 9th 2006. i was standing looking at something in the car and a femalew asked me what that was in the sky. i turned and said it was a satelite, she said no it's going way to fast! i looked for a second and agreed, and then i added it was also to big and to bright. it flew in seemingly a straight line. we all watched it zoom pat but two of us went to higher ground to see it longer and thats when it dissapeared out of the atmposhphere. we were all shocked
content.summary: Flew from one horizon to the other. 90 seconds after it disapeared a jet flew in the same flight path

content.detailedDescription: I was with my girlfriend virginia s. we were standing in her yard near a bon-fire. we looked up in the air and saw an object. it appeared to be a circle of 6 lights with a center axis light. it stayed motionless or near motionless for about a half minute and then suddenly accellerated like a bullet and moved off to the northwest and disappeared within 5 or 6 seconds. we both saw it and commented about it to her parents. i also contacted my friend who's step-father works at the airport 5 miles away. he said no aircraft were in the area and he reported nothing on radar.
content.summary: Stationary circle of 6 lights with center light in middle of circle, sudden acceleration to northwest

content.detailedDescription:
I and my father were walking our dog on a cold evening, ar around 9pm or so. 
we were talking about life in general and all what people talk about in the evenings.

i looked up into the dark sky, and i told my father to also look up, and we both saw these 3 lights forming a triangle.
these 3 lights rotated around and around for at least 30 minutes to an hour. 
we tried to understand what it could have been!
and it did look just like the underneath of a some sort of ufo space craft. 3 lights glowing, and rotating around and around. 
we though maybe some club or disco down town, reflect lights into the sky! 
we are still not sure if there are any clubs down town that do that sort of thing.
i think if we go around to the main clubs etc, and ask them if they have ever used some sort of reflecting facility that causes a reflection into the sky.
content.summary: 3 lights forming a triangle
